name: Lost Dunes
description: Lost Dunes is an Open World, Adventure, RPG! Set in Ancient Egypt with some Modern aspects. Your home has been pillaged and burned by bandits. Seek them out to extract your revenge. Take on side-tasks, and help locals to gain access to pyramids and crypts. Lost Dunes also has combat, mining, and building. You can fight the ravenous animals of the desert, you can mine jewels in the mineshafts, you can build pyramids that can be used to automate mining and weapon creation!
